title: Chinese Account Or Kr, need Help!
body: Can someone create me a Kr or chinese account pls having some trouble...

replies.body: you can use qq  to log in the China lol

To create an account on the Korea server, you have to be a Korean citizen and you can create the account by visiting [this page](http://www.leagueoflegends.co.kr/). As for China, you'll need to visit [this page](http://lol.qq.com/) to create an account. Riot doesn't operate League in China, Tencent does. You'll need to contact their support if you require assistance with creating an account on the Chinese server. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
